mapper.update: update MARKER_INFO set PANEL_ID = #{panelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARKER_NAME = #{markerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARKER_ALIAS = #{markerAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARKER_ORDER = #{markerOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MARKER_DESC = #{markerDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, PANEL_ID, MARKER_NAME, MARKER_ALIAS, MARKER_ORDER, MARKER_DESC from MARKER_INFO
